text: Hello, I am a freelance Full-stack Web Developer, Minecraft Plugin Developer and student of Cyber Security at SSPÅ .

As a Full-stack Web Developer I have ~2 year experience in HTML, CSS, JS. And ~1 year experience in tailwindCSS, TypeScript, ExpressJS and framework SvelteKit. I can fairly say that I am able to create any website the client has in mind.
In Minecraft Plugin Development I have ~1 year experience of Java and Spigot API. I enjoy working on smaller / medium size plugins.
Right now I am studying a 3nd year of IT/Cyber Security at high school in the Czech Republic. In this school I learned of programming language C#, PC Hardware, Linux, Bash scripting.
